snp4.6:804: Appaṁ vata jīvitaṁ idaṁ,Oraṁ vassasatāpi miyyati;Yo cepi aticca jīvati,Atha kho so jarasāpi miyyati.
snp4.6:805: Socanti janā mamāyite,Na hi santi niccā pariggahā;Vinābhāvasantamevidaṁ,Iti disvā nāgāramāvase.
snp4.6:806: Māraṇenapi taṁ pahīyati,Yaṁ puriso mamidanti maññati;Etampi viditvā paṇḍito,Na mamattāya nametha māmako.
snp4.6:807: Supinena yathāpi saṅgataṁ,Paṭibuddho puriso na passati;Evampi piyāyitaṁ janaṁ,Petaṁ kālaṅkataṁ na passati.
snp4.6:808: Diṭṭhāpi sutāpi te janā,Yesaṁ nāmamidaṁ pavuccati;Nāmaṁyevāvasissati,Akkheyyaṁ petassa jantuno.
snp4.6:809: Sokapparidevamaccharaṁ,Na jahanti giddhā mamāyite;Tasmā munayo pariggahaṁ,Hitvā acariṁsu khemadassino.
snp4.6:810: Patilīnacarassa bhikkhuno,Bhajamānassa vivittamāsanaṁ;Sāmaggiyamāhu tassa taṁ,Yo attānaṁ bhavane na dassaye.
snp4.6:811: Sabbattha munī anissito,Na piyaṁ kubbati nopi appiyaṁ;Tasmiṁ paridevamaccharaṁ,Paṇṇe vāri yathā na limpati.
snp4.6:812: Udabindu yathāpi pokkhare,Padume vāri yathā na limpati;Evaṁ muni nopalimpati,Yadidaṁ diṭṭhasutaṁ mutesu vā.
snp4.6:813: Dhono na hi tena maññati,Yadidaṁ diṭṭhasutaṁ mutesu vā;Nāññena visuddhimicchati,Na hi so rajjati no virajjatīti.
